sentence: í ka tàafe` ni í ka sàbara` bɛ ɲɔ́gɔn tà.

comms_internal: «твоя юбка и твоя обувь подходят друг другу», букв. «... берут друг друга». It is not possible to express this meaning with an asymmetric construction. An alternative was obtained for the stimulus ‘This car is adapted to the African conditions’:  Nìn mɔ́bili` bɛ̀rɛbɛ̀n-nen dòn Afriki cógoya` mà [this car\ART fit-PTCP.RES Africa way\ART to]. Here, the verb is bɛ̀rɛbɛ̀n and the structure is SBJ_ma. However, this translation could not be accepted because it is semantically dissimilar to the original stimulus.
